pr_title: CGMES updates: reduce size of changelog not recording state variables

timeline.message:
CGMES updates: reduce size of changelog not recording state variables

Signed-off-by: Luma <zamarrenolm@aia.es>

timeline.author: annetill

timeline.bodyText: Now, we have non linear shunt compensator, so it means that we also have to support that for the CGMES update. I wonder if the code is working for that kind of equipment.
timeline.author: annetill

replies.bodyText: I will have to review. Current export does not support NonLinearShuntCompensators.
replies.author: zamarrenolm

replies.bodyText: I propose to add export support for that equipment in a separate, specific PR.
replies.author: zamarrenolm

replies.bodyText: Yes, great. I am going to open an issue to keep that in mind and I am going to merge this PR as it is.
replies.author: annetill

timeline.message:
Fix typo in comment

Signed-off-by: Luma <zamarrenolm@aia.es>
